background_context.situation: Uses website for event sign-ups and directory searches
background_context.environment: Works on a computer all day
background_context.constraints: Occasional technical issues with the website

goals_motivations.drives: Desires to connect with others and stay informed about events
goals_motivations.achievements: Successfully sign up for events and find information about attendees

behaviors_patterns.current_work_style: Uses the website a couple of times a week
behaviors_patterns.habits: Checks the events calendar and looks up names before attending events

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Difficulty completing sign-ups on the website
pain_points_frustrations.issues: Has experienced instances where sign-up wouldn't complete, leading to abandonment

needs_desires.looking_for: Easier access to event information and attendee details

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Values being informed about event participants
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Prefers using the website over the app for most tasks

technical_comfort.tools_used: Website for event sign-ups and directory lookups
technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Comfortable with basic website navigation but hesitant with app usage
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Learns through use and exploration, prefers not to download apps unnecessarily

quotes: I go on to sign up for stuff.
It just wouldn't complete. Like when I was signing up for something, it didn't.
I like to have some idea of, gee, is anybody from Minnesota or does anybody, you know, what are they?
